org.anarres.cpp

Class StringLexerSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.cpp.Source
      • org.anarres.cpp.LexerSource
        • org.anarres.cpp.StringLexerSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Iterable<Token>

    public class StringLexerSource
extends LexerSource
    A Source for lexing a String. This class is used by token pasting, but can be used by user code.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringLexerSource(java.lang.String string)
      Creates a new Source for lexing the given String.
      StringLexerSource(java.lang.String string, boolean ppvalid)
      Creates a new Source for lexing the given String.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StringLexerSource

        public StringLexerSource(java.lang.String string,
                 boolean ppvalid)
        Creates a new Source for lexing the given String.
        Parameters:
        ppvalid - true if preprocessor directives are to be honoured within the string.

      • StringLexerSource

        public StringLexerSource(java.lang.String string)
        Creates a new Source for lexing the given String. By default, preprocessor directives are not honoured within the string.
